messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

expense upload expense upload hi uploaded weeks mobile app approx expense lines when check fusion only items visible could someone please review let know where line items obviously these were accrued couple weeks ago still have receipts if upload failed expense details lost any help you can provide would be greatly appreciated thanks technical programme manager id canary

message.reasoning:
**Determining the Ticket Type**

I'm now zeroing in on the correct IT ticket category, based on the user's description. The issue of the invisible expense lines in the mobile app is the focus. After careful review, I believe the category should be "HR Support".


**Pinpointing the Best Fit**

I've been meticulously analyzing the ticket content. The "HR Support" category, while seemingly related to expenses, isn't the best fit.
